stories.text: I was going through the "new" posts section of HN. I waded through 5-6 pages of it and saw many good posts that just get lost into the plethora of posts that are made on HN everyday. There are lot of good posts on HN that do not make it in front of lot of HN readers. If you have to solve this issue(either from HN platform perspective or from a reader's perspective, or both), then what would you do?
stories.title: Ask HN: Bright minds of HN, how would you solve the HN posts disappearing issue?
